entries: You solved crimes as a police inspector or took jobs for wealthy clients as a private investigator. You might have become an adventurer as part of your next big mystery, but likely it was due to the consequences or aftermath of a prior case.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Society} skill and the {@skill Lore||Underworld Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Streetwise} skill feat.
